content:
Online Chess Lessons

— Train Under a World Champion

Online chess lessons that start from absolute beginner level — for kids and adults.
White Knight Chess Academy helps you learn step-by-step with structured courses, live coaching, and clear progress tracking.
Guided by Head Mentor Adam King — World Chess Champion (2002–2004).

Join our chess community
Inspired by strategy

Learn chess online with real coaches

At White Knight Academy, we offer structured online chess lessons with experienced coaches — from beginner-friendly instructors to titled players. Learn step by step with a clear plan, real feedback, and training that fits your level, language, and schedule.

With a focus on progress, we combine live coaching with guided homework and self-study materials — including tactical puzzles, game analysis, and practice tasks — so every lesson turns into measurable improvement. If you’re looking for a chess coach online or an online chess tutor, you’re in the right place.

Chess mastery

Beginner chess lessons, tactics, strategy, and endgames — taught step by step

Online lessons

Train with an online chess teacher in small groups or 1-to-1 coaching

Progress challenge

Track improvement with sparring, checkpoints, and internal rating events

Learning community

Supportive classes for kids, teens, adults, and seniors — grow together

Upcoming chess events

Chess Tournaments & Rating Challenges

Join our upcoming chess events designed to turn training into real results. White Knight Academy runs online tournaments, themed sparring sessions, and internal rating challenges for beginners and improvers — with coach feedback and clear learning goals after each event.

Compete in a friendly environment, practice time management, and learn how to play under pressure. Each event includes curated pairings by level, post-game review options, and recommended homework based on your games — making it a natural extension of your online chess lessons and chess online training.

Selected events may be organized under official rating regulations when applicable.

Bringing strategy to your day

Impressive facts about White Knight Academy

White Knight Academy is a new international chess platform built by lifelong players with 30+ years of experience and a coaching background with both kids and adults. Based between Poland and Canada, we’re creating a modern training environment that combines expert coaching, structured study paths, and AI-assisted analysis — for classical chess and Chess960.

  • Ready to make your first move?
Countless training sessions are waiting

We’re assembling a team of 10+ professional coaches, including grandmasters, to support students at every level — especially beginners who want a clear starting path. Our goal is to build an academy that works across time zones, with fast access to feedback: game reviews, tournament preparation, and practical improvement you can measure. New to chess? Read the official rules here.

Online Chess Course: Tactics, Strategy & Progress

LOOKING FOR ONLINE CHESS LESSONS?

Online Chess Lessons FAQ

Find quick answers about our online chess lessons, levels, schedules, and coaching format. If you’re new to chess, we’ll help you start from the basics and progress step-by-step.

ARE THESE ONLINE CHESS LESSONS SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS?

Yes. Our program starts from the basics (how pieces move, check, checkmate) and then gradually adds tactics and strategy. You can begin at any level after a short placement check.

DO YOU OFFER LIVE ONLINE CHESS COACHING?

Yes. We offer live lessons with a tutor, plus structured materials for self-practice between sessions. This combination helps students improve faster and stay consistent.

WHAT AGES DO YOU TEACH?

We teach both kids and adults. For children, the lessons are more interactive and game-based, while adults follow a clear training plan focused on real improvement.

HOW DOES THE LEARNING PATH WORK?

We love helping startups grow! Our solutions are made to support new ventures, building strong brands from the ground up.

WHAT DO I NEED TO START?

Just a stable internet connection and a device (laptop/tablet/phone). A chessboard is optional — we use an online board during lessons, and you can practice anytime.

HOW DO I JOIN AND BOOK A LESSON?

Click Courses (or Join Membership) on the homepage and choose your preferred option. We’ll confirm the schedule and help you start with the right level.
